Since 'winner takes all' capitalism was introduced by Ronald Regan there has been an inevitable drift towards oligarchy. The 1% keep getting richer. First generation Entrepreneurial wealth is morphing into dynastic wealth. Soon it will not be possible to distinguish economically between Russian oligarchy and American oligarchy. I delete two oligarchies will have more in common with each other than with 99% of their fellow countrymen.
